title: Journey to the 100 Man Fight (2013 WEBRIP)
description:
This movie follows Judd Reid's training from the World Kumite Organisation headquarters in Thailand under current master Ian McInnes as he explains what lead him to decide to undertake such a difficult challenge. There are interviews with his teachers, colleagues, family, friends and training partners who paint a picture of just who Judd is and where he comes from.  

Synopsis: As a teenager he was selected to go to Japan and train every day for 1000 days under Kyokushin Karate founder Masutatsu Oyama. Almost 20 years later he won the WKO world heavyweight championship. His attitude was always anything is possible and never give up. Then came the invitation to attempt the 100 man kumite. Journey to the 100 Man Fight tells Judd's incredible story of life long dedication to martial arts and his attempt at the 100 man kumite in the twilight of his fight career. Follow him as he prepares to take on what is considered by many martial arts elders the ultimate challenge of the spirit.
